summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6117 for the improvement of Mead Street from 48th Avenue South to 51st Avenue South; and certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84531, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
